text: maḷavun keren nægiṭuvanu labana dinaya dakvā ovunaṭa erehi va napuru dan̆ḍuvamen dan̆ḍuvam karana aya evanu ætæyi num̆bagē paramādhipati nivēdanaya kaḷa avasthāva sihipat karanu. niyata vaśayenma num̆bagē paramādhipati dan̆ḍuvam dīmehi itā vēgavatya. tavada niyata vaśayenma ohu ati kṣamāśīlī karuṇā guṇayen yuktaya
